room_title: Escape room "Case File: X" by Eludesions Escape Rooms in Phoenix
room_address: 2710 W Bell Road, Suite 1200, Phoenix, AZ 85053
room_description:
On June 25, 2013, following the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request filed in 2005, the CIA publicly acknowledged the existence of the highly secretive base for the first time known as Area 51. In response to additional FOIA requests, the CIA was forced to declassify many once secretive documents detailing the history and purpose of this renowned facility.
To avoid further pressure, the CIA devised a covert operation to remove highly classified and sensitive documents from the facility and relocate them to a remote location in Arizona in an effort to preserve their secrecy.
You and your group of renegade journalists have tracked down this new location and have made it your purpose to seize this fleeting opportunity to uncover the most hidden and coveted of all national secrets â€“ Case File X.
